text: Polybotryoideae is a subfamily of the fern family Dryopteridaceae. ==Genera== The Pteridophyte Phylogeny Group classification of 2016 (PPG I) accepts the following genera: *Cyclodium C.Presl *Maxonia C.Chr *Olfersia Raddi *Polybotrya Humb. & Bonpl. ex Willd. *Polystichopsis (J.Sm.) C.Chr. *Stigmatocarpum L.Bolus *Stigmatopteris C.Chr. *Trichoneuron Ching ==References== Category:Dryopteridaceae Category:Plant subfamilies
title: Polybotryoideae
